name: Prioritizing Purpose: A Strategic Blueprint for Building Value-Based DAOs
description: A deep dive into the philosophy, process, and tech stack behind building value-based community DAOs.

speakers.name: Ron Rivers
speakers.bio:
I speak about binding system and spirit in alignment with the single truth and relational universe.

My efforts coalesce at the intersection of Spirituality, Web3, AI, Political Economy, Philanthropy, and Systemic Reformation.

Past: web2 founder w/ exit, civic tech 501c3 executive director, community organizer, state senate candidate, spent past 2.5 years having 150+ conversations with place-based foundations. 

Author of Self-Actualization in the Age of Crisis. 

Co-founding member of SpiritDAO.
